components.title: Web Art Work
components.description: Web freelancer’s community based in Ukraine with over 10 years in app/web development. Working to create products with the "Waw!" aftertaste.

components.title: Web Art Work Freelancers
components.description: Skilled students who’ve completed mentorship and are ready to take on real projects. They write clean code, communicate clearly, and deliver like pros.

components.title: Web Art Work Mentorship
components.description: A community-led program where mentors help students write quality code, grow as freelancers, and develop essential soft skills for real-world projects.
